name: @geekagency/peerjs-react-hooks
description: Hooks for handling PeerJS in react

scripts.pub: npm run publish:react; npm run publish:preact
scripts.pack: npm run pack:preact; npm run pack:react
scripts.bundle:preact: npx rollup -e react,preact,preact/hooks -f cjs --exports named --preserveModules -d dist/preact/cjs dist/preact/*.js
scripts.bundle:react: npx rollup -e react,preact,preact/hooks -f cjs --exports named --preserveModules -d dist/react/cjs dist/react/*.js
scripts.build: npm run pack:react && npm run pack:preact && npm run bundle:preact && npm run bundle:react
